ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder

Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.ImageController

  • public class ImageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for images. Decides how to access the image depending on where the recipe is saved (internal/external).

        Parameters:

        location - Recipe location enum.
        Returns:

        location - Recipe location enum.

      • getNumberImages

        Gets the number of images that a recipe has saved on the sdcard
        Parameters:
        uuid - Recipe to be examined.
        location - Where recipe is stored (local/external).
        Returns:
        Number of images said recipe has.
